ChangeLog.Entry: Added support for Simon S100 Thermostat.

Value.label: Display brightness
Value.Help: Display brightness from 1% to 100%. Default is 20%.

Value.label: Lock buttons
Value.Help: Locks the buttons in the device.

Value.label: Reset default values (read only)
Value.Help: Restore factory values to default (read only).

Item.label: Parameters, Groups, and Z-Wave status are restored to default
Parameters, except 'Long key press lock', are restored to default

Value.label: Post reset state
Value.Help: Post reset state.

Item.label: After the reset, the load is deactivated (default)
After the reset, the load is activated
After the reset, the load retrieves the state

Value.label: Long key press lock
Value.Help: Long key press of P5 button (temperature down button). In "Unlocked" mode acts as described in the user manual (default). In "Locked" mode: - When key press time is between 2s and 10s does not send Node Info. - When key press time is greater than 30s and the buttons are NOT locked (see 'Lock buttons' configuration), it sends a Node Info. - When key press time is greater than 30s and the buttons are locked (see 'Lock buttons' configuration), the Node Info is only sent when thermostat is ON.

Value.label: Lock manual scheduling
Value.Help: Locks the manual scheduling heating times.

Value.label: Celsius/Fahrenheit
Value.Help: Display Celsius or Fahrenheit temperature values. The configurations are always made in Celsius.

Value.label: Upload temperature and humidity automatically
Value.Help: Upload temperature and humidity automatically

Item.label: Upload only when temperature difference condition is met
Upload only when timing difference condition is met
Upload when temperature difference and timing conditions are met (default)

Value.label: Upload temperature difference condition
Value.Help: Base on 0.1C unit, 5 by default, 5*0.1C=0.5C. Minimum 3 (0.3C), maximum 100 (10.0C). Default is 5 (0.5C).

Value.label: Upload timing difference condition
Value.Help: Base on 1s unit. Minimum 10s, maximum 1000s. 60s by default.

Value.label: Upload humidity difference condition
Value.Help: Upload when percent difference exceeded. 3% by default.

Value.label: Temperature (Celsius)
Value.Help: - Maximum temperature: 0 - 500 Maximum Setpoint temperature. Temperatures above are discarded (370 is 37C, default value). - Minimum temperature: 0 - 500 Minimum Setpoint temperature. Temperatures below are discarded (50 is 5C, default). - Offset temperature: -10 ... 10 Offset applied to the internal temperature sensor with an accuracy of 0.1C (0 is 0C, default value).

Value.label: Time Condition 1 for Monday
Value.Help: The thermostat's time conditions are formed by structures with 4 configurations, where each configuration establishes one of the 4 possible time conditions for each day of the week. B0 Hour // B1 Minute // B2, B3 Temperature in Celsius with 0.1C resolution
